data.title: gCMCRT: 3D Monte Carlo Radiative Transfer for exoplanet atmospheres using GPUs
data.name: gCMCRT
data.description: 3D Monte Carlo Radiative Transfer for exoplanet atmospheres using GPUs.

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "You will need to install the latest drivers from Nvidia: https://www.nvidia.com/Download/index.aspx"
"gCMCRT - 3D Monte Carlo Radiative Transfer for exoplanet atmospheres with GPUs" (describes a domain-specific radiative transfer code used to generate spectra and synthetic observations)

"Run gCMCRT to produce Em_001.txt (dayside) and Em_002.txt (nightside) output files" and then "Run em_spec.py to convert the output to synthetic observations" (shows it directly produces research spectra/results)
